cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CE, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with the problem of contextual bandits, which is a subfield of machine learning and reinforcement learning. The use of linear models and the focus on regret analysis suggest that the paper is more likely to belong to the categories of "cs.LG" (Machine Learning) and "cs.AI" (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves the analysis of algorithms and the use of probability theory, which are relevant to the categories of "cs.DS" (Data Structures and Algorithms) and "cs.IT" (Information Theory). Finally, the paper discusses the impact of context diversity, which is related to the category of "cs.CE" (Computational Economics and Finance).
